actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority relating to comprehensive planning grants (Deferral No. D 75-107) which is proposed by the President in his special message of November 26, 1974, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives disapproves the deferral of budget authority relating to comprehensive planning grants under the Housing Act of 1954 proposed by the President in his special message of November 26, 1975.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority relating to comprehensive planning grants (Deferral No. D 75-107) which is proposed by the President in his special message of November 26, 1974, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
